00031 #include <lustre_quota.h>

00038 static inline int fid2type(const struct lu_fid *fid)
00039 {
00040         LASSERT(fid_is_acct(fid));
00041         if (fid_oid(fid) == ACCT_GROUP_OID)
00042                 return GRPQUOTA;
00043         return USRQUOTA;
00044 }
00045 
00046 static inline int obj2type(struct dt_object *obj)
00047 {
00048         return fid2type(lu_object_fid(&obj->do_lu));
00049 }
00050 
00064 int osd_acct_obj_lookup(struct osd_thread_info *info, struct osd_device *osd,
00065                         const struct lu_fid *fid, struct osd_inode_id *id)
00066 {
00067         struct super_block *sb = osd_sb(osd);
00068         unsigned long qf_inums[2] = {
00069                 le32_to_cpu(LDISKFS_SB(sb)->s_es->s_usr_quota_inum),
00070                 le32_to_cpu(LDISKFS_SB(sb)->s_es->s_grp_quota_inum)
00071         };
00072 
00073         ENTRY;
00074         LASSERT(fid_is_acct(fid));
00075 
00076         if (!LDISKFS_HAS_RO_COMPAT_FEATURE(sb,
00077                                            LDISKFS_FEATURE_RO_COMPAT_QUOTA))
00078                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
00079 
00080         id->oii_gen = OSD_OII_NOGEN;
00081         id->oii_ino = qf_inums[fid2type(fid)];
00082         if (!ldiskfs_valid_inum(sb, id->oii_ino))
00083                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
00084         RETURN(0);
00085 }
00086 
00099 static int osd_acct_index_lookup(const struct lu_env *env,
00100                                  struct dt_object *dtobj,
00101                                  struct dt_rec *dtrec,
00102                                  const struct dt_key *dtkey)
00103 {
00104         struct osd_thread_info  *info = osd_oti_get(env);
00105 #ifdef HAVE_DQUOT_FS_DISK_QUOTA
00106         struct fs_disk_quota    *dqblk = &info->oti_fdq;
00107 #else
00108         struct if_dqblk         *dqblk = &info->oti_dqblk;
00109 #endif
00110         struct super_block      *sb = osd_sb(osd_obj2dev(osd_dt_obj(dtobj)));
00111         struct lquota_acct_rec  *rec = (struct lquota_acct_rec *)dtrec;
00112         __u64                    id = *((__u64 *)dtkey);
00113         int                      rc;
00114 #ifdef HAVE_DQUOT_KQID
00115         struct kqid              qid;
00116 #endif
00117 
00118         ENTRY;
00119 
00120         memset(dqblk, 0, sizeof(*dqblk));
00121 #ifdef HAVE_DQUOT_KQID
00122         qid = make_kqid(&init_user_ns, obj2type(dtobj), id);
00123         rc = sb->s_qcop->get_dqblk(sb, qid, dqblk);
00124 #else
00125         rc = sb->s_qcop->get_dqblk(sb, obj2type(dtobj), (qid_t)id, dqblk);
00126 #endif
00127         if (rc)
00128                 RETURN(rc);
00129 #ifdef HAVE_DQUOT_FS_DISK_QUOTA
00130         rec->bspace = dqblk->d_bcount;
00131         rec->ispace = dqblk->d_icount;
00132 #else
00133         rec->bspace = dqblk->dqb_curspace;
00134         rec->ispace = dqblk->dqb_curinodes;
00135 #endif
00136         RETURN(+1);
00137 }
00138 
00139 #define QUOTA_IT_READ_ERROR(it, rc)                                    \
00140         CERROR("%s: Error while trying to read quota information, "    \
00141                "failed with %d\n",                                     \
00142                osd_dev(it->oiq_obj->oo_dt.do_lu.lo_dev)->od_svname, rc); \
00143 
00144 
00150 static struct dt_it *osd_it_acct_init(const struct lu_env *env,
00151                                       struct dt_object *dt,
00152                                       __u32 attr)
00153 {
00154         struct osd_it_quota     *it;
00155         struct lu_object        *lo = &dt->do_lu;
00156         struct osd_object       *obj = osd_dt_obj(dt);
00157 
00158         ENTRY;
00159 
00160         LASSERT(lu_object_exists(lo));
00161 
00162         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(it);
00163         if (it == NULL)
00164                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM));
00165 
00166         lu_object_get(lo);
00167         it->oiq_obj = obj;
00168         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&it->oiq_list);
00169 
00170         /* LUSTRE_DQTREEOFF is the initial offset where the tree can be found */
00171         it->oiq_blk[0] = LUSTRE_DQTREEOFF;
00172 
00173         /* NB: we don't need to store the tree depth since it is always
00174          * equal to LUSTRE_DQTREEDEPTH - 1 (root has depth = 0) for a leaf
00175          * block. */
00176         RETURN((struct dt_it *)it);
00177 }
00178 
00184 static void osd_it_acct_fini(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_it *di)
00185 {
00186         struct osd_it_quota *it = (struct osd_it_quota *)di;
00187         struct osd_quota_leaf *leaf, *tmp;
00188         ENTRY;
00189 
00190         lu_object_put(env, &it->oiq_obj->oo_dt.do_lu);
00191 
00192         list_for_each_entry_safe(leaf, tmp, &it->oiq_list, oql_link) {
00193                 list_del_init(&leaf->oql_link);
00194                 OBD_FREE_PTR(leaf);
00195         }
00196 
00197         OBD_FREE_PTR(it);
00198 
00199         EXIT;
00200 }
00201 
00213 static int osd_it_acct_get(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_it *di,
00214                            const struct dt_key *key)
00215 {
00216         struct osd_it_quota     *it = (struct osd_it_quota *)di;
00217         const struct lu_fid     *fid =
00218                                 lu_object_fid(&it->oiq_obj->oo_dt.do_lu);
00219         int                      type = fid2type(fid);
00220         qid_t                    dqid = *(qid_t *)key;
00221         loff_t                   offset;
00222         int                      rc;
00223 
00224         ENTRY;
00225 
00226         offset = find_tree_dqentry(env, it->oiq_obj, type, dqid,
00227                                    LUSTRE_DQTREEOFF, 0, it);
00228         if (offset > 0) { /* Found */
00229                 RETURN(+1);
00230         } else if (offset < 0) { /* Error */
00231                 QUOTA_IT_READ_ERROR(it, (int)offset);
00232                 RETURN((int)offset);
00233         }
00234 
00235         /* The @key is not found, move to the first valid entry */
00236         rc = walk_tree_dqentry(env, it->oiq_obj, type, it->oiq_blk[0], 0,
00237                                0, it);
00238         if (rc == 0)
00239                 rc = 1;
00240         else if (rc > 0)
00241                 rc = -ENOENT;
00242 
00243         RETURN(rc);
00244 }
00245 
00251 static void osd_it_acct_put(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_it *di)
00252 {
00253         return;
00254 }
00255 
00256 static int osd_it_add_processed(struct osd_it_quota *it, int depth)
00257 {
00258         struct osd_quota_leaf *leaf;
00259 
00260         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(leaf);
00261         if (leaf == NULL)
00262                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00263         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&leaf->oql_link);
00264         leaf->oql_blk = it->oiq_blk[depth];
00265         list_add_tail(&leaf->oql_link, &it->oiq_list);
00266         RETURN(0);
00267 }
00268 
00278 static int osd_it_acct_next(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_it *di)
00279 {
00280         struct osd_it_quota     *it = (struct osd_it_quota *)di;
00281         const struct lu_fid     *fid =
00282                                 lu_object_fid(&it->oiq_obj->oo_dt.do_lu);
00283         int                      type = fid2type(fid);
00284         int                      depth, rc;
00285         uint                     index;
00286 
00287         ENTRY;
00288 
00289         /* Let's first check if there are any remaining valid entry in the
00290          * current leaf block. Start with the next entry after the current one.
00291          */
00292         depth = LUSTRE_DQTREEDEPTH;
00293         index = it->oiq_index[depth];
00294         if (++index < LUSTRE_DQSTRINBLK) {
00295                 /* Search for the next valid entry from current index */
00296                 rc = walk_block_dqentry(env, it->oiq_obj, type,
00297                                         it->oiq_blk[depth], index, it);
00298                 if (rc < 0) {
00299                         QUOTA_IT_READ_ERROR(it, rc);
00300                         RETURN(rc);
00301                 } else if (rc == 0) {
00302                         /* Found on entry, @it is already updated to the
00303                          * new position in walk_block_dqentry(). */
00304                         RETURN(0);
00305                 } else {
00306                         rc = osd_it_add_processed(it, depth);
00307                         if (rc)
00308                                 RETURN(rc);
00309                 }
00310         } else {
00311                 rc = osd_it_add_processed(it, depth);
00312                 if (rc)
00313                         RETURN(rc);
00314         }
00315         rc = 1;
00316 
00317         /* We have consumed all the entries of the current leaf block, move on
00318          * to the next one. */
00319         depth--;
00320 
00321         /* We keep searching as long as walk_tree_dqentry() returns +1
00322          * (= no valid entry found). */
00323         for (; depth >= 0 && rc > 0; depth--) {
00324                 index = it->oiq_index[depth];
00325                 if (++index > 0xff)
00326                         continue;
00327                 rc = walk_tree_dqentry(env, it->oiq_obj, type,
00328                                        it->oiq_blk[depth], depth, index, it);
00329         }
00330 
00331         if (rc < 0)
00332                 QUOTA_IT_READ_ERROR(it, rc);
00333         RETURN(rc);
00334 }

00341 static struct dt_key *osd_it_acct_key(const struct lu_env *env,
00342                                       const struct dt_it *di)
00343 {
00344         struct osd_it_quota *it = (struct osd_it_quota *)di;
00345 
00346         ENTRY;
00347         RETURN((struct dt_key *)&it->oiq_id);
00348 }

00355 static int osd_it_acct_key_size(const struct lu_env *env,
00356                                 const struct dt_it *di)
00357 {
00358         struct osd_it_quota *it = (struct osd_it_quota *)di;
00359 
00360         ENTRY;
00361         RETURN((int)sizeof(it->oiq_id));
00362 }

00370 static int osd_it_acct_rec(const struct lu_env *env,
00371                            const struct dt_it *di,
00372                            struct dt_rec *dtrec, __u32 attr)
00373 {
00374         struct osd_it_quota     *it = (struct osd_it_quota *)di;
00375         const struct dt_key     *key = osd_it_acct_key(env, di);
00376         int                      rc;
00377 
00378         ENTRY;
00379 
00380         rc = osd_acct_index_lookup(env, &it->oiq_obj->oo_dt, dtrec, key);
00381         RETURN(rc > 0 ? 0 : rc);
00382 }

00390                                const struct dt_it *di)
00391 {
00392         struct osd_it_quota *it = (struct osd_it_quota *)di;
00393 
00394         ENTRY;
00395         RETURN(it->oiq_id);
00396 }

00409 static int osd_it_acct_load(const struct lu_env *env,
00410                             const struct dt_it *di, __u64 hash)
00411 {
00412         ENTRY;
00413         RETURN(osd_it_acct_get(env, (struct dt_it *)di,
00414                                (const struct dt_key *)&hash));
00415 }

00420 const struct dt_index_operations osd_acct_index_ops = {
00421         .dio_lookup     = osd_acct_index_lookup,
00422         .dio_it         = {
00423                 .init           = osd_it_acct_init,
00424                 .fini           = osd_it_acct_fini,
00425                 .get            = osd_it_acct_get,
00426                 .put            = osd_it_acct_put,
00427                 .next           = osd_it_acct_next,
00428                 .key            = osd_it_acct_key,
00429                 .key_size       = osd_it_acct_key_size,
00430                 .rec            = osd_it_acct_rec,
00431                 .store          = osd_it_acct_store,
00432                 .load           = osd_it_acct_load
00433         }
00434 };
00435 
00436 static inline void osd_quota_swab(char *ptr, size_t size)
00437 {
00438         int offset;
00439 
00440         LASSERT((size & (sizeof(__u64) - 1)) == 0);
00441 
00442         for (offset = 0; offset < size; offset += sizeof(__u64))
00443              __swab64s((__u64 *)(ptr + offset));
00444 }
00445 
00446 const struct dt_rec *osd_quota_pack(struct osd_object *obj,
00447                                     const struct dt_rec *rec,
00448                                     union lquota_rec *quota_rec)
00449 {
00450 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN
00451         struct iam_descr        *descr;
00452 
00453         LASSERT(obj->oo_dir != NULL);
00454         descr = obj->oo_dir->od_container.ic_descr;
00455 
00456         memcpy(quota_rec, rec, descr->id_rec_size);
00457 
00458         osd_quota_swab((char *)quota_rec, descr->id_rec_size);
00459         return (const struct dt_rec *)quota_rec;
00460 #else
00461         return rec;
00462 #endif
00463 }
00464 
00465 void osd_quota_unpack(struct osd_object *obj, const struct dt_rec *rec)
00466 {
00467 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN
00468         struct iam_descr *descr;
00469 
00470         LASSERT(obj->oo_dir != NULL);
00471         descr = obj->oo_dir->od_container.ic_descr;
00472 
00473         osd_quota_swab((char *)rec, descr->id_rec_size);
00474 #else
00475         return;
00476 #endif
00477 }
00478 
00479 static inline int osd_qid_type(struct osd_thandle *oh, int i)
00480 {
00481         return (oh->ot_id_type & (1 << i)) ? GRPQUOTA : USRQUOTA;
00482 }
00483 
00484 static inline void osd_qid_set_type(struct osd_thandle *oh, int i, int type)
00485 {
00486         oh->ot_id_type |= ((type == GRPQUOTA) ? (1 << i) : 0);
00487 }
00488 
00504 int osd_declare_qid(const struct lu_env *env, struct osd_thandle *oh,
00505                     struct lquota_id_info *qi, struct osd_object *obj,
00506                     bool enforce, int *flags)
00507 {
00508         struct osd_device       *dev = osd_dt_dev(oh->ot_super.th_dev);
00509         struct qsd_instance     *qsd = dev->od_quota_slave;
00510         struct inode            *inode = NULL;
00511         int                      i, rc = 0, crd;
00512         bool                     found = false;
00513         ENTRY;
00514 
00515         LASSERT(oh != NULL);
00516         LASSERTF(oh->ot_id_cnt <= OSD_MAX_UGID_CNT, "count=%d\n",
00517                  oh->ot_id_cnt);
00518 
00519         for (i = 0; i < oh->ot_id_cnt; i++) {
00520                 if (oh->ot_id_array[i] == qi->lqi_id.qid_uid &&
00521                     osd_qid_type(oh, i) == qi->lqi_type) {
00522                         found = true;
00523                         break;
00524                 }
00525         }
00526 
00527         if (!found) {
00528                 /* we need to account for credits for this new ID */
00529                 if (i >= OSD_MAX_UGID_CNT) {
00530                         CERROR("Too many(%d) trans qids!\n", i + 1);
00531                         RETURN(-EOVERFLOW);
00532                 }
00533 
00534                 if (obj != NULL)
00535                         inode = obj->oo_inode;
00536 
00537                 /* root ID entry should be always present in the quota file */
00538                 if (qi->lqi_id.qid_uid == 0) {
00539                         crd = 1;
00540                 } else {
00541                         /* used space for this ID could be dropped to zero,
00542                          * reserve extra credits for removing ID entry from
00543                          * the quota file */
00544                         if (qi->lqi_space < 0)
00545                                 crd = LDISKFS_QUOTA_DEL_BLOCKS(osd_sb(dev));
00546                         /* reserve credits for adding ID entry to the quota
00547                          * file if the i_dquot isn't initialized yet. */
00548                         else if (inode == NULL ||
00549                                  inode->i_dquot[qi->lqi_type] == NULL)
00550                                 crd = LDISKFS_QUOTA_INIT_BLOCKS(osd_sb(dev));
00551                         else
00552                                 crd = 1;
00553                 }
00554 
00555                 osd_trans_declare_op(env, oh, OSD_OT_QUOTA, crd);
00556 
00557                 oh->ot_id_array[i] = qi->lqi_id.qid_uid;
00558                 osd_qid_set_type(oh, i, qi->lqi_type);
00559                 oh->ot_id_cnt++;
00560         }
00561 
00562         if (unlikely(qsd == NULL))
00563                 /* quota slave instance hasn't been allocated yet */
00564                 RETURN(0);
00565 
00566         /* check quota */
00567         if (enforce)
00568                 rc = qsd_op_begin(env, qsd, oh->ot_quota_trans, qi, flags);
00569         RETURN(rc);
00570 }
00571 
00590 int osd_declare_inode_qid(const struct lu_env *env, qid_t uid, qid_t gid,
00591                           long long space, struct osd_thandle *oh,
00592                           struct osd_object *obj, bool is_blk, int *flags,
00593                           bool force)
00594 {
00595         struct osd_thread_info  *info = osd_oti_get(env);
00596         struct lquota_id_info   *qi = &info->oti_qi;
00597         int                      rcu, rcg; /* user & group rc */
00598         ENTRY;
00599 
00600         /* let's start with user quota */
00601         qi->lqi_id.qid_uid = uid;
00602         qi->lqi_type       = USRQUOTA;
00603         qi->lqi_space      = space;
00604         qi->lqi_is_blk     = is_blk;
00605         rcu = osd_declare_qid(env, oh, qi, obj, true, flags);
00606 
00607         if (force && (rcu == -EDQUOT || rcu == -EINPROGRESS))
00608                 /* ignore EDQUOT & EINPROGRESS when changes are done by root */
00609                 rcu = 0;
00610 
00611         /* For non-fatal error, we want to continue to get the noquota flags
00612          * for group id. This is only for commit write, which has @flags passed
00613          * in. See osd_declare_write_commit().
00614          * When force is set to true, we also want to proceed with the gid */
00615         if (rcu && (rcu != -EDQUOT || flags == NULL))
00616                 RETURN(rcu);
00617 
00618         /* and now group quota */
00619         qi->lqi_id.qid_gid = gid;
00620         qi->lqi_type       = GRPQUOTA;
00621         rcg = osd_declare_qid(env, oh, qi, obj, true, flags);
00622 
00623         if (force && (rcg == -EDQUOT || rcg == -EINPROGRESS))
00624                 /* as before, ignore EDQUOT & EINPROGRESS for root */
00625                 rcg = 0;
00626 
00627         RETURN(rcu ? rcu : rcg);
00628 }
00629 
00630 int osd_quota_migration(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_object *dt)
00631 {
00632         struct osd_thread_info  *oti = osd_oti_get(env);
00633         struct osd_device       *osd = osd_obj2dev(osd_dt_obj(dt));
00634         struct dt_object        *root, *parent = NULL, *admin = NULL;
00635         dt_obj_version_t         version;
00636         char                    *fname, *fnames[] = {ADMIN_USR, ADMIN_GRP};
00637         int                      rc, i;
00638         ENTRY;
00639 
00640         /* not newly created global index */
00641         version = dt_version_get(env, dt);
00642         if (version != 0)
00643                 RETURN(0);
00644 
00645         /* locate root */
00646         rc = dt_root_get(env, &osd->od_dt_dev, &oti->oti_fid);
00647         if (rc) {
00648                 CERROR("%s: Can't get root FID, rc:%d\n", osd->od_svname, rc);
00649                 RETURN(rc);
00650         }
00651 
00652         root = dt_locate(env, &osd->od_dt_dev, &oti->oti_fid);
00653         if (IS_ERR(root)) {
00654                 CERROR("%s: Failed to locate root "DFID", rc:%ld\n",
00655                        osd->od_svname, PFID(&oti->oti_fid), PTR_ERR(root));
00656                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(root));
00657         }
00658 
00659         /* locate /OBJECTS */
00660         rc = dt_lookup_dir(env, root, OBJECTS, &oti->oti_fid);
00661         if (rc == -ENOENT) {
00662                 GOTO(out, rc = 0);
00663         } else if (rc) {
00664                 CERROR("%s: Failed to lookup %s, rc:%d\n",
00665                        osd->od_svname, OBJECTS, rc);
00666                 GOTO(out, rc);
00667         }
00668 
00669         parent = dt_locate(env, &osd->od_dt_dev, &oti->oti_fid);
00670         if (IS_ERR(parent)) {
00671                 CERROR("%s: Failed to locate %s "DFID", rc:%ld\n",
00672                        osd->od_svname, OBJECTS, PFID(&oti->oti_fid),
00673                        PTR_ERR(parent));
00674                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(parent));
00675         }
00676 
00677         /* locate quota admin files */
00678         for (i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
00679                 fname = fnames[i];
00680                 rc = dt_lookup_dir(env, parent, fname, &oti->oti_fid);
00681                 if (rc == -ENOENT) {
00682                         rc = 0;
00683                         continue;
00684                 } else if (rc) {
00685                         CERROR("%s: Failed to lookup %s, rc:%d\n",
00686                                osd->od_svname, fname, rc);
00687                         GOTO(out, rc);
00688                 }
00689 
00690                 admin = dt_locate(env, &osd->od_dt_dev, &oti->oti_fid);
00691                 if (IS_ERR(admin)) {
00692                         CERROR("%s: Failed to locate %s "DFID", rc:%d\n",
00693                                osd->od_svname, fname, PFID(&oti->oti_fid), rc);
00694                         GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(admin));
00695                 }
00696 
00697                 if (!dt_object_exists(admin)) {
00698                         CERROR("%s: Old admin file %s doesn't exist, but is "
00699                                "still referenced in parent directory.\n",
00700                                osd->od_svname, fname);
00701                         lu_object_put(env, &admin->do_lu);
00702                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOENT);
00703                 }
00704 
00705                 LCONSOLE_WARN("%s: Detected old quota admin file(%s)! If you "
00706                               "want to keep the old quota limits settings, "
00707                               "please upgrade to lower version(2.5) first to "
00708                               "convert them into new format.\n",
00709                               osd->od_svname, fname);
00710 
00711                 lu_object_put(env, &admin->do_lu);
00712                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00713         }
00714 out:
00715         if (parent && !IS_ERR(parent))
00716                 lu_object_put(env, &parent->do_lu);
00717         lu_object_put(env, &root->do_lu);
00718         RETURN(rc);
00719 }
